menu.item-veg-description: Okra cooked in onion tomato based gravy with pickled spices served with 2 chapatis + papad + side salad

menu.item-nonveg-name: Appam with Kerala Style Egg Curry

menu.item-veg-description: A comfort meal from the state of Kerala. Black gram cooked in a flavourful curry served with steamed riceflour cakes.
